title: Arcade Poro icon changes
body:
I know I'm probably being a bit pedantic, but one of the main reasons I bought the arcade *dungeon pass was because I really liked they way the arcade poro icon looked. 

Now rito has removed the rainbow border and cropped the icon to be a circle on a black square. I don't like it nearly as much, I probably wouldn't have the bundle if it were like this originally. (Feral Warwick all over again)

Can we stop making arbitrary, unnecessary changes? (And revert...?)

Here, excuse the image quality:
http://imgur.com/a/npGe0
